entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly.GetTypes fails on System.DirectoryServices assembly #68240
  • Inconsistency in root .editorconfig with published coding style. #68238
  • Tar APIs pending feedback to address #68230
  • PushRange empty Array throws exception #68228
  • [API Proposal]: `IBinaryInteger<TSelf>.ReverseEndianess`. #68227
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySequence overload for WriteRawValue #68223
  • [NativeAOT] Benchmarks using Vector<T> seems to be slow #68222
  • Strings.resx is embedded twice into the assembly for projects that set EnableDefaultItems to true #68218
    7.0.0
  • pin over SPMI has unexpectedly high variance #68214
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] libSystem.IO.Compression.Native.so contains an unresolvable reference to symbol log2: it's probably a plugin #68212
  • [API Proposal]: Math.MulHigh #68207
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Security tests are failing #68206
  • [API Proposal]: Add SSE4.2 String Comparison Intrinsics #68204
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/TieredVtableMethodTests/TieredVtableMethodTests.sh #68197
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies loading failure #68192
  • Consider moving `IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.MaxNumber` down to `INumber<T>` #68191
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService crashes when started as service #67093
  • Unmanaged crashes (heap corruption) on Windows 11 #68225
  • Add API IndexNotOf #28795
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] Perf_FileStream.FlushAsync benchmark hangs on Debian 11 #67545
  • EventLoggerFactoryExtensions seems to disregard filters #46064
    Future
  • OSR gets wrong offset for memory arg on arm64 OSX #68194
  • `double.TryParse` sometimes doesn't parse the dot #68200
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking needs to handle capture groups when startat == input.Length #65606
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'isValidGeneralDatasize(size)' during 'Generate code' #68170
  • FDD app uses DOTNET_ROOT even though it points to wrong architecture #68180
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: \"api.nuget.org\") #67686
  • .NET 6 not support XslCompiledTransform.Load(type(myXsltCompiled_dll)) #68129
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok(useAsync: False) #67683
  • [API Proposal]: Implementations of marshallers using `CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute` #66623
    7.0.0
  • consider presenting IPv4-Mapped addresses as IPv4 #67952
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Encoding.UTF7 property access should be disabled by default #59319
  • System.Text.Json options throws an exception setting DefaultIgnoreCondition = Always #67740
  • mono minijit x64 test failure: loopinfinally_do.dll exception #68187
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers #65633
    7.0.0
  • CMP0068 CMake warning on mac #41084
    7.0.0
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` gets stuck on Windows #63552
    6.0.x
  • FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject no longer supports delegates #68144
  • Missing documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Properties #68150
  • SPMI failing in CI #68137
  • Debug.Assert failure in System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue in Debug Mono builds #68029
    7.0.0
  • Build failure: "...nativeaot\Runtime\Full\AsmOffsets.cs' could not be found" #68205

PullRequests

Created

  • [MAUI][Blazor][PERF] Add APK file usage for Android Maui Blazor SOD #68241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Rename .md files that are not actually markdown #68239
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update 'main' branding to release/7.0-preview5 #68236
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68235
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add missing RUC annotation to IAsyncEnumerableConverterFactory #68233
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added fixes for tests which are not robust against line endings #68231
    community-contribution
  • Build rolling release jits #68229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Sum/Average #68226
    area-System.Linq, needs-author-action
  • Exclude all markdown files from triggering CI #68221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid duplicate Strings.resx import & code-cleanup #68220
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exposing MaxMagnitudeNumber, MaxNumber, MinMagnitudeNumber, and MinNumber #68217
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stop IHostedService instances asynchronously by default #68216
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove CallArgABIInfo::ArgNum and fill out function headers #68209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add initial version of {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept #67941
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Treat SuperPMI failures in AzDO pipelines as pipeline failures #68196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a race condition in the thread pool #68171
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Delete AssemblySpec::m_wszCodeBase #68186
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • avoid allocating collection for intermediate certificates #68188
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: fix patchpoint offset encoding #68202
  • Two-phase matching algorithm for NonBacktracking #68199
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: fix issue with invalid operand size in OSR prolog on arm64 #68198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller #68173
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Update dump template (#68185)" #68224
    area-Meta
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add JSON type hierarchies #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Consistently use forward slashes in test exclusion lists #68215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_LIBUNWIND on macOS #68116
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix path in servicing doc #68208
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Cleanup ProjectN references #68201
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix cmake RPATH CMP0068 warnings #68095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixing casing issue with TargetPath #68184
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add links to docs #68211
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix very adventurous LIR::Use::GetDummyUse #68131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CheckValue is not a fast path for all callers #68125
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Updating System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support generic math #68141
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve performance of test partitioning #68172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Overhaul when/where we check for Regex timeouts #68146
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove platform dependent compilation of System.Private.Uri #68011
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix linux-x86 compilation for clr.alljits subset #68046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `System.Drawing.Common` and remove the Unix code. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Cleaning up write barrier code #68124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Allow running System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #67575
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Min/Max #68183
    area-System.Linq
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK 6.0.202 - Detected package downgrade during dotnet restore #24931
  • SDK tests end up modifying the SDK manifests #24923

Closed

  • [Preview] Unable to restore packages from feeds with encrypted passwords on windows #23498
  • With .NET 6.0.105, restoring project failed on Mariner 2.0 x64 #24875

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to lock the mono manifest file to figure out which tests are upda… #24932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24929
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch updates to include for the targeted package references #24922
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update branding to 6.0.400 #24921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24914
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Ensure stable property is set on asset manifest #24927
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24899
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update Branding #24934
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a fabricbot.json file to auto close issues with "Area-NuGet" label #24589
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make NamingStylePreferences messagepack serializable #60849
  • Stack Trace Explorer should have middle click to close tab #60848
  • We are creating in-proc compilations for OOP analysis when full-solution analysis is on #60843
    17.3
  • Make Generate parameter refactoring aware of CancellationToken convention #60842
    Backlog
  • Copy pasting code is bringing in using namespace though not required #60841
    17.3
  • "Speculative" keywords (discard, field) binding + private symbols in base type #60836
  • Convert to interpolated string refactoring is not available in VB when an implicit conversion is used #60835
    Backlog
  • C# 10 nullable type "?" character display seems inconsistent in the Intellisense display of the XML documentation #60833
    17.3
  • GoToDefinitionOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotAlreadyOpen failed with "cannot navigate to symbol" #60831
    17.3

Closed

  • Refactor local function from lambda #60701
    17.3
  • Generic completions should add `<>` and put cursor between them #60751
    Backlog
  • Improve `nameof` completion #60669

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #60850
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Fix the color key for rename hint text at the bottom #60847
    Area-IDE
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure idle-processing (like solution syncing) does not execute while paused due to global operations (like msbuild compiles) #60845
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #60844
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove deprecated NuPkg projects #60839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cherry-pick 60493 to 17.2 #60832
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Avoid artificial tagging delay when called by consumer that is explicitly blocking for results. #60830
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude System.Text.Encoding.CodePages from OptProf #60827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TypeScript code actions and Xaml remove unused usings #60829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Convert Visual Basic error list tests to the new framework #60588
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add OptProf.json to CI excluded files #60828
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Revert "Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string (#60227)" #60851
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply 'require accessibility modifiers' setting on interface methods #60226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Use solution filter instead of multiple solutions #47531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EventSource logging to RateLimitingMiddleware #41266
    7.0-preview5
  • IIS tests that look at EventLog are flaky #41264
  • Personal access token support in Identity #41262
  • Best practice for a singleton route handler filter with Minimal APIs? #41259
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet watch hangs while a Time Machine backup is being run on macOS Monterey #41257
    Backlog
  • Performance on bursts of requests on IIS less than ideal and results in rejected requests #41255
  • Testing ASP.NET Core with trimming #41252
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • FromServicesAttribute not optional #20444
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support for route handler filters in minimal APIs issue #41188
    7.0-preview4
  • Double setting of Bound Variable when using EventCallback Async Await with HttpClient call #41217
  • Poor performance resolving tilde paths in Razor tags #41234
  • The Web Project Description Error ,OpenAPI OR OpenAI？ #39529
    6.0.x
  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.ClientCompressedUnary #41248
  • IIS Application Pool Recycle returns unexpected 503 #10117
    Discussions
  • Cannot build the project which reference to another project #41210
  • build fails for new WebAPI project after switching to TargetFrameworks (plural) #40577
    7.0-preview4
  • Hotreload does not show updated value from ViewBag #41220
  • Asp.Net Core Web App + Background Service + Web Api In Same Project? #41204
  • Random CSS class name generation #41227
  • Introduce Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #40676
    7.0-preview4
  • IContractResolver must be passed to ConversionResultProvider methods in JSON Patch library #16690
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Check in launchesttings.json from AzureAd.Website #41267
    area-security
  • Add MapGroup #41265
  • Improve abort handling #41263
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Place XML comment hrefs in see elements #41254
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security, 7.0-preview4
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • Capture target from delegates and MethodInfo #41253
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Fixed the window update hangs #41256
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview4
  • Use file-scoped namespace #41261
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove some legacy folders and add area-grpc, area-web-frameworks #41260
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41238
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Use handler directly in gRPC interop tests #41251
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview4
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-dataprotection, area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Flow IContractResolver through JsonPatch method calls #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Split KestrelTrace into multiple files #41245
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Span.GestureRecognizers - TapGestureRecognizer not working on windows and Android in Visual Studio 2022 .NET Maui #6257
  • Image from byte[] source doesn't work on Android #6256
  • MAUI app template will not build due to LibZipSharp error VS Community 2022 Preview 3 #6254
  • [Android] CheckBox styles not changing with AppThemeBinding #6253
    6.0.300
  • [Spike] Audit Picker accessibility and focusable behavior #6252
    6.0.300-servicing
  • VSM currently doesn't undo correctly when using `AppThemeBinding` #6251
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] IsReadOnly=true EditText controls are not focusable #6250
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Blazor Hybrid index.html script and css files are case sensitive #6248
  • CollectionView Header overlapped with EmptyView #6247
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Shell AppThemeBinding is incorrect and not consistent #6244
    6.0.300
  • Shell FlyoutItem Icon doesn't render first time #6243
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Frame/Border/Shadow should have Elevation property #6233
  • StreamImageSource doesn't work on Image Control #6231
  • Embedded images not render in Android Maui #6228
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RadioButton preselection in xaml with multiple RadioButtonGroups not working #6227
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI RC1 - Shell - OnDisappearing not executing and OnAppearing is only executed the first time #6226
  • Http Client Maui Blazor #6219
  • add documentation for taking VS-generated default Maui project nad debugging with local Maui build #6218
  • Voiceover is not announcing the current count when we double tap on "click me" button. #6216
  • Voiceover is not reading the button for "click me" button. #6215
  • Modal pages in Android overlaps Android status bar #6214
  • New Page Feature in Visual Studio need update #6213
  • Multi-Window in Windows with all options #6210

Closed

  • [Bug] FlyoutPage does not render Flyout #2422
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Android] IllegalStateException on Navigation.PopAsync() #3338
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Grid width stretches off the page #4142
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • VerticalStackLayout doesn't update childs width #6235
  • MAUI RC1 is not compatible with Xamarin.iOS NuGet packages #6221
  • New Item Template for XAML ContentView creates a Resource Dictionary #6125
  • Mixing Shell and Push/Pop Navigation Sometime Fails #5965
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Shell][Windows] BackButton is not available/shown #5714
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • ListView context menu is not working. #6225
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground on Windows are not working #4266
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working for image #4743
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • StackLayout.IsEnabled = FALSE does not Disable the Child Components within it #6008
  • Release Candidate 1 Doesn't work on macOS or iOS #6082
  • sqlite path null #6145
  • EF Core migration does not work for IOS #6189
  • [Bug] Unexpected layout with Grid #2107
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
  • [Android] SelectableItemsViewAdapter: update SelectableViewHolder on selection changes #6249
  • Remove interfering keyboard focus logic #6246
  • Remove nuspec for old stuff #6245
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cleanup code format #6242
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Let's see if we can make these tests stable #6241
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • [Housekeeping | Windows] Revert changes in Button focus default behavior #6234
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-button
  • [ci] Remove pool demands for device tests #6224
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView

Merged

  • fix width constraint when measuring stacklayout children #6239
  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [android] update AOT profiles #6238
  • [Windows] Fix ListView menu events not working #6230
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView
  • [ci] Add dependabot #6236
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, partner, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Support dotnet build with UseMauiCore #6186
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Use infinity for measure constraints when determining auto sizes #6217
    area/layout 🔲
  • Improved Shell benchmark #6167
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/architecture
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix Timing #6197
    area/shell 🐢

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding: Don't use "GeneratedCode" directory as part of the namespace #27842
  • I expected client evaluation exception using a expression property in my select #27841
  • New batch size check doesn't take pending bulk insert commands into account #27840
  • LINQ : Select top distinct from group order by creationTime #27839

Closed

  • Query a subclass that shares the same table than its parents may result in a downcasting issue #27802
  • Migration Update Problem Due to Non-English Character in Database Name #27712
  • Remote provider with a proper API controller as endpoint #27793
  • Ability to hook into model finalization? #27790
  • KeyLess entity #27778
  • Scaffold entity configuration into separate files #27777
  • Visual Studio could not scaffold Entity Framework controller #27774
  • What is the difference between ValueConverter or OwnedType for simple value objects? #27758
  • Disable automatic 'order by' in query to decrease execution time #27746
  • IDbConnectionInterceptor DbConnection replacement #27744
  • Foreign Key conflict for optional relationship #27742
  • group join just dont work every time it say unable to translate #27710
  • Clause order is mixed up when logging SQL statements to console #27687
  • Allow to Disable All Automatic Relationships #27647
  • Table valued function with left joined table generates wrong nullable types #27823
  • Add support for Azure SQL Edge reverse engineering #27835
  • EFCore CosmosDB - Seed items with navigation properties #27789

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Enable linker and package-source-build in source-build #13669

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13655
